name: Love waifu #13 - Guardian of the Shore
description: On the bright beach, she strikes a poised battle stance, but there’s something hypnotic beneath the heroism. Her green costume reveals more than it hides, clinging to her body as if molded to every contour. Her matching green eyes are sharp — alert — yet behind the strength, there’s softness, waiting for someone to break through.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
